name: pressure

effect.sun-moon: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.sun-moon: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
